message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe it's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. Let me know your thoughts!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, I am only willing to pay $12,000 for it. This aligns more closely with my budget constraints. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I value the product at $15,000, I'm willing to come down to $13,000 to make this work. This would still provide me with a decent profit, and I believe it's a fair compromise.  Let me know if you're interested.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still only able to offer $12,000 for the product. This aligns better with my budget and I hope this meets your expectations for profit.
